name: Zombie Run (sketchadoodledoo)
description:
It's Halloween night, and you want to grab as much candy as you can! But there's a catch: zombies, bats, and ghosts are on the loose, and they're eager to eat you AND your candy! You must navigate through each level and collect candies while shooting (or avoiding) enemies. Try to get as many candies as you can and reach the end of the levels without dying!

Controls:

  • Move left/right: LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYS
  • Jump: UP ARROW
  • Shoot: SPACEBAR

*HINT* You can "stick" to and jump off of the side of floating platforms!

Artists: Celena Foglia, Tiffany Chow

Programmer: Prajesh Shrestha

Sounds found on FreeSound.org
